field.name: uf_group_id
field.title: Profile ID
field.comment: Which profile this link is associated with. NULL indicates "default search".

field.name: action
field.title: Action
field.comment: The action associated with this link. E.g. addToGroup, removeFromGroup.

field.name: label
field.title: Label
field.comment: This is the displayed text for the link.

field.name: hovertext
field.title: Hover Text
field.comment: This is the text displayed when you hover the mouse over the link. It's a good place to put a description.

field.name: action_entity_id
field.title: Action Entity ID
field.comment: If the action requires an entity ID, it is stored here.

field.name: dim_on_use
field.title: Dim on Use
field.comment: Should this link be disabled and the corresponding search result dimmed on click?

field.name: is_active
field.title: Action Link Is Active
field.comment: Is this link currently active? If not, do not show.

field.name: weight
field.title: Order
field.comment: Controls order in which links appear.
